articles.title: Milan unbeaten for 24 games in a row: equaling a record from more than 70 years ago! First place goes to Capello
articles.summary: Milan (24: 15W, 9D) remained unbeaten for at least 24 matches for the third time in a single Serie A season (24 matches between December 1950 and May 1951 and the 34 matches of the entire 1991/92 championship). Opta reports it.
